name: Pebbles (MasterMoni)
description:
Made by Tim Dijkstra for the GMTK jam 2021. 

Game can be played in browser or a Windows version is downloadable below.

Meet the pebbles, little creatures with special abilities. You are the yellow pebble, guide it through multiple puzzles. The goal of each puzzle is to reach the  shiny golden pebble. 

Other pebbles will aid you during each puzzle. When the yellow pebble moves close to them, they will join forces and the yellow pebble will be granted a new ability. However, be careful: the connection between the pebbles will be broken once the distance between them has become too large and the ability will be removed again!
